overview: The story of straight-edge literature professor Vivian who travels to Reno to get away from a relationship breakup when she falls in love with an attractive and unconventional girl named Cay.
tagline: In 1959, Vivian Bell came to Reno, Nevada for a quick divorce. Of all the people she met there, the one who surprised her the most was herself.
cast: Helen Shaver|Patricia Charbonneau|Audra Lindley|Andra Akers|Dean Butler
